data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barrio-Amorós, César L., Rivero, Ramón, Santos, Juan C. (2011): A new striking dendrobatid frog (Dendrobatidae: Aromobatinae, Aromobates) from the Venezuelan Andes. Zootaxa 3063: 39-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201877
